hexcasting.mishap.uninfusable: Expected an infusable block at %s, but got %s.
This will do something interesting eventually.
The spell does not do anything, similar to if I told someone to go home, when they were already at home.
oneironaut.page.dim_iotas.1: I've descovered a kind of iota which seems to represent a layer of reality itself. In lieu of better understanding, I've decided to call these Spatial Imprints.
oneironaut.page.dim_iotas.2: Returns a Spatial Imprint representing the dimension I am currently in.
oneironaut.page.dim_iotas.3: Returns a Spatial Imprint representing the dimension my sentinel is currently in.
oneironaut.page.dimteleport.1: Accepts an entity and a Spatial Imprint and teleports the entity to its position in the corresponding dimension. Costs 20 Charged Amethyst.
oneironaut.page.dimteleport.2: Also applies slow falling once the target reaches its destination, in case it arrives above void.$(br2)Will fail if supplied a player other than myself.$(br2)I get a strange sense of acceleration when subjected to this spell, but somehow it isn't along any axis I can comprehend. Could this be fourth-dimensional travel?
oneironaut.page.infusemedia.1: Accepts a vector and infuses finely-tuned media into the corresponding block. Cost and effect vary depending on target.

text.oneironaut.dimiota.name: Dimension Iota
oneironaut.advancements.noosphere.enter: A Realm of Thought and Dream
